# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

<!-- insertion marker -->
## [v1.2.9](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/releases/tag/v1.2.9) - 2025-11-29

<small>[Compare with v1.2.8](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/compare/v1.2.8...v1.2.9)</small>

### Features

- Enhance time manipulation utilities and add new helper methods to EpochTimestamp (#11) ([d855955](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/commit/d8559557fdd1182528236c645000c3e44ec95b8a) by Chaz).
- Add release workflow and initial changelog file for automated releases ([05e6926](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/commit/05e6926ce2c95625139f99f0d2060cb837f457a3) by chaz).

## [v1.1.8](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/releases/tag/v1.1.8) - 2025-07-23

## [v1.1.7](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/releases/tag/v1.1.7) - 2025-07-23

<small>[Compare with v1.0.1](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/compare/v1.0.1...v1.1.7)</small>

### Features

- Add time_since method to EpochTimestamp and TimeConverter for calculating time differences ([847d9fe](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/commit/847d9fe9e4456ffe97331b5cbff02ca7dfdf771a) by sicksubroutine).
- Implement EpochTimestamp class for epoch time handling ([6be93c8](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/commit/6be93c8e3d2e9b4ed5041255eb8fbb5e72ba0b50) by sicksubroutine).

### Code Refactoring

- Remove deprecated decorator and simplify method return statements in EpochTimestamp and helper functions (#8) ([e955cc6](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/commit/e955cc6325a1ea82be0022a66a6e2866dfc50621) by Chaz).
- Remove BasicLogger implementation and tests; update time-related constants ([b4b2407](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/commit/b4b2407f0b1b034d54958babeabcbe21804931c6) by sicksubroutine).
- Update TimerData initialization and logging mechanism ([6b364b8](https://github.com/sicksubroutine/bear-epoch-time/commit/6b364b876f73627487f471b8b72ad1505ba83bcf) by sicksubroutine).
